name: BoildarlingRobot
description:
[Synopsis]

The Bouldering Robo that Dr. created has a lot of reputation
Dr. who was totally professional,
I made a balloon type flight machine on a tone.
However, the machine went out of control during the test.
Dr. fly away to the sky.
Coincidentally, Bouldering Robo who was in place was trying to help as he told me.

【Method of operation】

→ ↓ ← ↑ Select stage
Space determination

→ ↓ ← ↑ Move both arms
X or Z grab and release
Space Pause screen

You can jump by repeating ↓ ↑.

【rule】
Grabbing a red block for a while will make it blue.
There are also some stages you have to grasp in order.
Once all the red blocks turn blue, the stage is clear.
